title: New Marvel Game From Skydance and Amy Hennig - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.29.21
description:
Blessing and Janet talk about a new Marvel game, Ubisoft delays, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Right after this episode of KFGD, we’re battling for CEO of Kinda Funny in Mario Party Superstars. It’s gonna be me, Nick, Tim, and snowbike Michaelangelo, that’s going down right here on Twitch.tv/Kindafunnygames, and later on youtube.com/kindafunnyplays
The finale episode of The Arkham Files premieres THIS SUNDAY on Halloween at 2:30pm PT on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames! Join Barrett as he talks about Arkham Knight and how it’s a masterpiece of an ending for the Arkham Trilogy
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:35 -  A new Marvel game has been announced
00:20:00 - Do we think Playstation will be getting any sort of exclusivity for this title? - Best Friends Q:BanderSN
00:24:54 - The ever-relevant question: What is going on at Ubisoft?
00:47:20 -  Ad
00:52:15 - Resident Evil Village to get free DLC, Capcom says - Wesley Yin-Poole @ Eurogamer
00:54:50 - Pragmata development is making "steady progress" says Capcom - Hirun Cryer @ GamesRadar
00:57:00 - Krafton Acquires Subnautica Developer Unknown Worlds - Kenneth Shepard @ Fanbyte
01:00:00 - Banjo-Kazooie’s composer has released a full album of remixed music - Chris Scullion @ VGC
01:03:45 - Out today
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Mon: Blessing and Tim
Tues: Tim and Whitta
Wed: Blessing and Andy
Thurs: Tam and Tim
Fri: Blessing and Janet

Right after this episode of KFGD, we’re battling for CEO of Kinda Funny in Mario Party Superstars. It’s gonna be me, Nick, Tim, and snowbike Michaelangelo, that’s going down right here on Twitch.tv/Kindafunnygames, and later on youtube.com/kindafunnyplays
